code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UrlForm=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[url,setUrl]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(url.trim()){onSubmit(url.trim());}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"url-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"url-input",children:"Enter URL to verify:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"url-input",type:"url",value:url,onChange:e=>setUrl(e.target.value),placeholder:"https://example.com",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"verify-button",children:"Verify URL"})]});};export default UrlForm;
